gap_analysis.content_focus: Comprehensive theoretical gaps analysis for research justification
gap_analysis.compression_strategy: Extract key theoretical gaps that demonstrate framework necessity

patterns_trends.content_focus: Key patterns in DER agent protocol literature
patterns_trends.compression_strategy: Focus on 3-5 major trends directly relevant to ACP/A2A

research_questions.compression_strategy: Use final refined questions directly, minimal compression needed

theoretical_framework.content_focus: Key concepts and relationships for ACP/A2A in DER context
theoretical_framework.compression_strategy: Extract core concept definitions and relationships

theoretical_gaps.content_focus: Comprehensive theoretical gaps analysis generated by enhanced script
theoretical_gaps.compression_strategy: Integrate theoretical gaps analysis to strengthen framework justification, demonstrate theoretical contributions, and provide evidence for framework necessity through identified gaps in current literature

elicit_results.content_focus: Literature sources and search methodology validation
elicit_results.compression_strategy: Reference as methodology validation, cite key papers only

practical_needs.content_focus: Industry practical challenges and requirements analysis
practical_needs.compression_strategy: Extract 2-3 most compelling practical justifications for HDT research

methodology_justification.compression_strategy: Use executive summary and final recommendation directly

feasibility_analysis.compression_strategy: Include top 3 methodology rankings and key feasibility factors

methodological_limitations.content_focus: Comprehensive methodological limitations analysis generated by enhanced script
methodological_limitations.compression_strategy: Integrate comprehensive methodological limitations analysis to provide strong justification for proposed approach, demonstrate how methodology addresses identified gaps, and support alternative methodology rejection decisions

methodology_comparison.compression_strategy: Summary table of top 5 alternatives with brief rationale

strengths_limitations.compression_strategy: Extract key limitations acknowledgment for selected methodology

timeline_workflow.compression_strategy: High-level timeline overview and key milestones only

ethics_framework.content_focus: Key ethical considerations for DER agent protocols

sustainability_impact.compression_strategy: Focus on SDG connections and environmental benefits, contextualizing the research within broader sustainability goals.

mitigation_strategies.content_focus: Practical mitigation approaches for ethical/sustainability concerns
mitigation_strategies.compression_strategy: Summarize key mitigation categories and approaches relevant to the research context

data_privacy.content_focus: Data privacy considerations for DER health data
data_privacy.compression_strategy: Brief mention of key privacy protection measures

social_economic.compression_strategy: Brief summary of positive social/economic outcomes, if highly relevant and concise

risk_management.compression_strategy: Focus on highest priority risks and mitigation approaches relevant to the proposal's scope

risk_prioritization.compression_strategy: Include top 5-7 highest priority risks with brief mitigation summary

risk_register.compression_strategy: Reference as supporting analysis, focus on categories rather than full register

timeline_planning.content_focus: Detailed implementation timeline, milestones, deliverables, resource considerations
timeline_planning.compression_strategy: Summarize key phases, deliverables, and milestones. Emphasize existence of detailed plan (Gantt, resource allocation) and refer to full doc. Ensure it demonstrates structured planning.

examiner_emphasis.focus: Rich in referenced facts but RELEVANT to chosen topic
examiner_emphasis.purpose: Good understanding of what you're going to do, not full literature review
examiner_emphasis.clarity: Avoid becoming vague toward the real problem - see forest for trees

compression_strategies.synthesize_not_describe: Transform detailed analyses into key insights
compression_strategies.relevance_filter: Include only content directly supporting research objectives
compression_strategies.summary_tables: Replace lengthy descriptions with structured tables
compression_strategies.high_impact_content: Prioritize findings that directly inform research design
compression_strategies.reference_detailed_work: Acknowledge comprehensive analyses while presenting distilled insights

introduction_background.focus: Problem context, key literature synthesis, research gap
introduction_background.strategy: Focus on most relevant findings, synthesize rather than describe

methodology.focus: Selected methodology justification, alternatives considered, assumptions, tools, boundaries
methodology.strategy: Focus on final justified approach, summarize alternatives, briefly state assumptions/tools/boundaries

ethics_sustainability.focus: Key ethical considerations contextualized, SDG alignment, mitigation
ethics_sustainability.strategy: Focus on high-priority contextualized concerns, summarize mitigation

risk_timeline.focus: Major risks and mitigation, structured timeline overview demonstrating detailed planning
risk_timeline.strategy: Focus on high-priority risks, provide timeline overview demonstrating a structured plan exists

introduction_background.grading_criteria_alignment: Addresses C-Grade: Research Gap Identification (supported by comprehensive theoretical gaps analysis, practical needs assessment, and literature from key_references). Provides foundational context for the entire proposal with enhanced gap justification.

objectives_questions.grading_criteria_alignment: Directly addresses C-Grade: Formulation of research questions. Ensures clarity and focus as per examiner guidance.

theoretical_framework.grading_criteria_alignment: Addresses C-Grade: Theoretical Framework. This section should also briefly outline key assumptions and system boundaries relevant to the framework, drawing from detailed methodology documents. Enhanced with comprehensive theoretical gaps analysis to strengthen framework justification.

methodology.grading_criteria_alignment: Addresses C-Grade: Methodology selection and justification. Will clearly state the chosen methodology, tools (e.g., ACP/A2A primitives, conceptual modeling), and justify choices. Should also clearly state key assumptions and system boundaries not covered in Theoretical Framework. Enhanced with comprehensive methodological limitations analysis to strengthen methodology justification.

ethics_sustainability.grading_criteria_alignment: Addresses A-Grade Option 1: Ethics and Sustainability Contextualization. Focuses on integrating key ethical concerns (data privacy, consent) and sustainability dimensions (environmental, SDG alignment) within the research context. Addresses ILO 6.

risk_timeline.grading_criteria_alignment: Addresses A-Grade Option 2: Structured Research Time Plan. Summarizes major risks and mitigation, and critically, provides an overview of the structured research timeline (key phases, deliverables, milestones from docs/5.3.3-project-timeline.md) to demonstrate detailed planning and resource considerations exist.
